ONE FOOT FOR EACH INCH
OF TRUNK DIAMETER OR

X
AREA

2.
PLANTING PLANS OR GRADING PLANS SHALL INDICATE LOCATIONS OF ALL
TREE PROTECTION FOR INDIVIDUAL AND/OR CLUSTERS OF TREES TO BE
NOT TO SCALE
PROTECTED.

NOTES:
1. ALL DIMENSIONS NOTED AS MINIMUMS ARE SUBJECT TO STANDARDS REQUIRED
BY ARTICLES 13 AND 16 OF THE CREEDMOOR DEVELOPMENT ORDINANCE.
2. WATER AND SEWER MAY BE REVERSED FROM LOCATION SHOWN ABOVE.
3. WATER AND SEWER SEPARATION SHALL BE IN ACCORDANCE WITH SECTION
.0900 OF THE RULES GOVERNING PUBLIC WATER SYSTEMS.
4. WATER AND SEWER SHALL BE INSTALLED UNDER THE PAVEMENT TO ELIMINATE
PROBLEMS WITH PROPERTY OWNER COMPLAINTS CONCERNING DAMAGE WHEN
MAINTENANCE IS REQUIRED ON THE LINES.
5. TELEPHONE, CABLE TV AND POWER SHALL BE LOCATED JUST INSIDE THE
STREET RIGHT-OF-WAY (COLOCATION IS ENCOURAGED).
